meanings.definition: A skateboarding trick where the rider and board leap into the air without the use of the rider's hands.
meanings.sent1: He practiced his ollie in the skate park.
meanings.sent2: The skateboarder effortlessly performed an ollie over the obstacle.
meanings.sent3: The ollie was so high, it seemed like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her ollie was like a bird taking flight from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The ollie's gracefulness amazed everyone watching.

meanings.sent1: Ollie is a friendly neighbor who always waves hello.
meanings.sent2: I met a new friend named Ollie at the party.
meanings.sent3: Ollie's name always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: When Ollie enters the room, it lights up with joy.
meanings.sent5: I can never forget Ollie's cheerful presence.
